content: it s granny squares galore in this fun sampler blanket three different sized grannies are made separately and seamed together for a piece that will be a hit in your home when changing colors work up to the last stitch in the old color working the final pull-through in the new color cut colors and weave in ends at color changes finished measurements width 36 length 48 gauge 2 round granny = 3 4 round granny = 6 6 round granny = 9 *save time check your gauge * materials premier® yarns puzzle® 100% acrylic 7oz/200g 328yds/300m c1 1050-44 kickball 3 balls premier® yarns puzzle® solids 100% acrylic 7oz/200g 328yds/300m c2 2162-14 brown 3 balls hooks & notions us size i-9 5 5 mm or size needed to obtain gauge tapestry needle skills/techniques used in this pattern chains slip_stitch single and double_crochet stitch magic_ring changing colors seaming with mattress stitch
